name: Bubble Ball!
description:
You've got one job: combine as many balls as you can inside the confines of the container.
Stack too high or spill some over the edge and it's all over!
Matching two balls of the same type will convert them into one ball of the next tier; the higher the tier, the more points you earn.
Think you can get a ball of the highest tier? .....What about two of them?

3 Levels


Sports
Introducing the Ball Launcher. Hold down the 'drop' button to charge up power and send them balls soarin'.
Start with Ping Pong Balls flying everywhere and end with Beach Balls getting pummeled.
Balls have individualized weights so be careful! An 8-Ball has a bit more oomph to it than a larger Tennis Ball.

Planets (Coming Soon)
Bubble Ball! in Spaaace!
Things will be floaty...

Bubbles (Coming Soon)
Under the sea, not all bubbles are your friends.
Careful of pesky currents pushing your stuff around!

Custom Levels

Mix and match your favorite settings:
  • Balls
    - Sports, Planets, or Bubbles (currently only Sports is available)
  • Weight
    - Individualized or Uniform
  • Ball Dropper
    - Normal, Launcher
  • Gravity
    - Normal, Low Grav (Coming Soon)
